name: The Machinations (Commodore 64)
description:
The Machinations is an automation puzzle game for Commodore 64.

Transport the binary cell from the source to the target using the modules at your disposal. The game is a remake of The Sequence by One Man Band.

A preview version can be downloaded below. It contains 2 module types, 10 levels, and quite possibly, bugs.

The full version of the game will feature six module types, around 40 levels including sandbox levels, sound effects, and (hopefully) no bugs. The planned release date is towards the end of March.

A manual is included in the download archive. You can also check out a quick 2-minute tutorial video here: 

I hope you will enjoy it. Comments and suggestions are welcome.
